title: Citi Second Quarter 2022 Fixed Income Investor Review
summary: New York - Mark Mason, Chief Financial Officer, and Michael Verdeschi, Treasurer, will conduct the Citigroup Second Quarter 2022 Fixed Income Investor Review at 11 a.m. (ET) on Thursday, July 28, 2022. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-1: Citi Second Quarter 2022 Fixed Income Investor Review
tag-2: New York – Mark Mason, Chief Financial Officer, and Michael Verdeschi, Treasurer, will conduct the Citigroup Second Quarter 2022 Fixed Income Investor Review at 11 a.m. (ET) on Thursday, July 28, 2022. The review will be available live via webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The webcast and presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/citi/investor/pres.htm. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available after the call.
tag-4: To attend the live webcast please visit https://www.veracast.com/webcasts/citigroup/webinars/RZ6490.cfm
tag-5: If you'd like to dial into the live Fixed Income Investor Review, please call (800) 343-1703 (for U.S. and Canada callers) or (203) 518-9859 (for international callers).
tag-6: A telephonic replay of the call will be available beginning approximately two hours after the event until Thursday, August 4, 2022, by calling (800) 839-2459 (for U.S. and Canada callers) or (402) 220-7218 (for international callers).
tag-7: CitiCiti is a preeminent banking partner for institutions with cross-border needs, a global leader in wealth management and a valued personal bank in its home market of the United States. Citi does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions, providing corporations, governments, investors, institutions and individuals with a broad range of financial products and services.
